p: The oil samples were allowed to react with p-anisidine to produce a colored compound, and the absorbance values were read at 350 nm using a spectrometer (LKB Novaspec II; Pharmacia, Sweden) AV was measured based on the method of Wu etÂ al. (2009). Isooctane is the fat solvent in this test. The investigative reagent is 1 ml 0.25% anisidine in glacial acetic acid.
